sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Carousel } from "react-bootstrap"; function EventDetailPage({ event }) { return (

{event.name}

{event.description}

Kategori: {event.categoryId}

Adres: {event.address}

Konum: {event.location}

Başlangıç Tarihi: {new Date(event.startedAt).toLocaleString()}

Bitiş Tarihi: {new Date(event.finishedAt).toLocaleString()}

Resimler

{event.Photos.map((photo) => ( ))}

Standlar

{event.Stands.map((stand) => ( ))}
Grup Koltuk Numarası Fiyat
{stand.group} {stand.seatNumber} {stand.price} TL
); } export default EventDetailPage;
